ygData.subject: Re: Doh
ygData.msgSnippet: I remembered some connection between Lord G and the Waki - and a post you made about giving him the LotGP and getting nada (and then killing him for his
ygData.messageBody:
I remembered some connection between Lord G and the Waki - and a post you
made about giving him the LotGP and getting nada (and then killing him for
his impertenance?) Did not remember is he was the original Waki quest or if
he was only a rumor of something. Thanks for the info!

Sylly

> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> he will just equip thre lute if you give it to him. he used to be the old
> waki quest before the maid/butler.
>
> > I
> > heard the rumor of the quest connected to him and Mistmoore, I never
> > followed up on it.
